001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model;
002
003import android.annotation.SuppressLint;
004import android.graphics.Rect;
005import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
006import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
007import java.util.Objects;
008
009/**
010 * Represents the player's ship within the game. Manages ship movement, shooting, and interaction
011 * with game elements.
012 */
013public class Ship {
014
015  private static final String TO_STRING_FORMAT = "%1$s[key=%2$s, name=%3$s, fly=%4$s]";
016  private static final int SHIP_SIZE = 30;
017  private final String key = null;
018  private int xPosition;
019  private int yPosition;
020  private String name;
021  private boolean fly;
022  private Rect shipBox;
023  private GameField gameField;
024  private Projectile projectile;
025  private double xVelocity;
026  private double yVelocity;
027  private double velocity;
028  private int positionX;
029  private int positionY;
030  private double angle;
031  private double shipPosition;
032  private double totalFlyingTime;
033  private double flyingTime;
034  private double gravity;
035
036
037  /**
038   * Constructs a Ship object at a specified position within the game field.
039   *
040   * @param gameField The game field in which the ship exists.
041   * @param y         The Y-coordinate position of the ship.
042   * @param x         The X-coordinate position of the ship.
043   */
044  public Ship(GameField gameField, int y, int x) {
045    // FIXME: 11/9/23 Check if this is correct
046    //ship = new Rect(0, gameField.getBoundingBox().top/2,0,0);
047    this.gameField = gameField;
048    positionX = x;
049    positionY = y;
050    computeShipBox();
051  }
052
053  private void computeShipBox() {
054    shipBox = new Rect(positionX - SHIP_SIZE, positionY - SHIP_SIZE / 2, positionX + SHIP_SIZE,
055        positionY + SHIP_SIZE / 2);
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Moves the ship upwards within the game field. Adjusts the ship's position by moving it in the
060   * upward direction.
061   */
062  public void moveUp() {
063    if (positionY - SHIP_SIZE > gameField.getBoundingBox().top - 5) {
064      positionY -= 10;
065      computeShipBox();
066    }
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Moves the ship downwards within the game field. Adjusts the ship's position by moving it in the
071   * downward direction.
072   */
073  public void moveDown() {
074    if (positionY - SHIP_SIZE / 2 < gameField.getBoundingBox().bottom - SHIP_SIZE - 5) {
075      positionY += 10;
076      computeShipBox();
077    }
078  }
079
080
081  /**
082   * Checks if the current object's bounding box intersects with another rectangle (meteor).
083   *
084   * @param intersect The Rect object representing the meteor bounding rectangle.
085   * @return {@code true} if there is an intersection; {@code false} otherwise.
086   */
087  public boolean intersects(Rect intersect) {
088    return shipBox.intersect(intersect);
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Fires a projectile from the ship.
093   *
094   * @return The fired projectile object.
095   */
096  public Projectile fire() {
097    computeTrajectory(velocity);
098    Projectile projectile = new Projectile(positionX, positionY, xVelocity, yVelocity, gravity,
099        gameField);
100    return projectile;
101  }
102
103//  public boolean canFire(Rect project) {
104//    return !project.isEmpty();
105//  }
106
107
108  /**
109   * Computes the trajectory of the projectile based on the given velocity.
110   *
111   * @param velocity The velocity of the projectile.
112   */
113  public void computeTrajectory(double velocity) {
114    shipPosition = shipBox.height();
115    xVelocity = (velocity * Math.cos(Math.toRadians(angle)));
116    yVelocity = -(velocity * Math.sin(Math.toRadians(angle)));
117    //gravity = gameField.getMeteor().getGravity();
118    totalFlyingTime =
119        -yVelocity - (Math.sqrt(Math.pow(yVelocity, 2) - (4 * shipPosition * 0.5 * gravity))
120            / gravity);
121  }
122
123//  public double getVelocity() {
124//    return velocity;
125//  }
126
127  /**
128   * Sets the velocity value the ship will use for the projectile.
129   *
130   * @param velocity The velocity value to be set.
131   */
132  public void setVelocity(double velocity) {
133    this.velocity = velocity;
134  }
135
136//  public double getAngle() {
137//    return angle;
138//  }
139
140  /**
141   * Sets the angle value the ship will use for the projectile.
142   *
143   * @param angle The angle value to be set.
144   */
145  public void setAngle(double angle) {
146    this.angle = angle;
147  }
148
149  /**
150   * Sets the gravity value the ship will use for the projectile.
151   *
152   * @param gravity The gravity value to be set.
153   */
154  public void setGravity(double gravity) {
155    this.gravity = gravity;
156  }
157
158//  public int getPositionX() {
159//    return positionX;
160//  }
161
162  public int getPositionY() {
163    return positionY;
164  }
165
166  /**
167   * Retrieves the bounding box of the ship.
168   *
169   * @return The Rect object representing the bounding box of the ship.
170   */
171  public Rect getShipBox() {
172    return shipBox;
173  }
174
175//  public void setPositionY(int positionY) {
176//    this.positionY = positionY;
177//    computeShipBox();
178//  }
179//
180//  public void setPositionX(int positionX) {
181//    this.positionX = positionX;
182//    computeShipBox();
183//  }
184
185
186  @Override
187  public boolean equals(@Nullable Object obj) {
188    boolean equivalent;
189    if (obj == this) {
190      equivalent = true;
191    } else if (obj instanceof Ship other) {
192      //noinspection ConstantValue
193      equivalent = Objects.equals(key, other.key) && Objects.equals(name, other.name)
194          && (fly == other.fly);
195    } else {
196      equivalent = false;
197    }
198    return equivalent;
199  }
200
201  @Override
202  public int hashCode() {
203    return (name == null) ? Objects.hash(key, fly) : Objects.hash(key, name, name);
204  }
205
206  @SuppressLint("DefaultLocale")
207  @NonNull
208  @Override
209  public String toString() {
210    return String.format(
211        TO_STRING_FORMAT, getClass().getSimpleName(), key, name, fly);
212  }
213
214}
